title: Arcade Riven Auto attacks
body: Don't you guys think that the Arcade Riven skin auto attacks are very hard to hear? I prefer the original auto attack sound as it is more clearer.

replies.body:
I honestly play better with Crimson Elite Riven because her blade is really pronounced and clear and because she has a dark colored theme it's really easy to see her and really easy to see her attack animation which to me makes it easier to not accidentally cancel auto-attacks while stutter stepping and also makes it easier to chain autos in between skills without accidentally cancelling them.

Can see where you're coming from. A lot of skins cause things like this.
I like the arcade auto attacks but thats just me. I can definitely see where you're coming from but I still believe arcade attacks are better {{champion:92}}
